General.Name: Yueyang Xingchang Petro-Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Yueyang Xingchang Petro-Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China. Its products include methyl tert-butyl ether, liquefied petroleum gas, propylene, industrial isooctane, o-cresol, woven bags, etc. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Yueyang, China.
